entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
